game.name: Mulligans Golf Game
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mulligans Golf Game is an Open Map Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when playing golf with your friends. The experience has been simplified to allow non golfers to play, but provides depth to challenge those looking for more!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mulligans Golf Game is an Open Map Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when playing golf with your friends. The experience has been simplified to allow non golfers to play, but provides depth to challenge those looking for more!
